DOC.brief_title: Treatment Calcium Phosphate Kidney Stone Disease
DOC.detailed_description: We examine two short-term placebo-controlled cross-over metabolic study whether citric acid potassium citrate reduce calcium phosphate saturation urine CaP stone former . The first study conduct hypocitraturic CaP stone former without hypercalciuria , compare effect potassium citrate , citric acid placebo . The second study conduct hypercalciuric CaP stone former thiazide diuretic require potassium supplementation , compare effect potassium chloride alone , potassium chloride + citric acid , potassium citrate alone . Physicochemical assay apply addition computer-based stone risk prediction program assess risk stone recurrence .
DOC.criteria: Aim 1 Hypocitraturic CaP stone former urine citrate < 320mg/d elevate pH 24hr urine pH 6.40 > 21 year Aim 2 Hypercalciuric CaP stone former 24hr urine calcium > 250mg/d woman > 300mg/d men prior indapamide use high pH > 6.40 absence urinary tract infection > 21 year
